Flow.description: Home Office Main flow. This is the flow deciding where to go next in the portal process for Home Office

formulas.name: TaskDescription
formulas.expression: "Contact " + {!$User.FirstName} + " " + {!$User.LastName} + " on Customer " + {!Opportunity.Account.Name} + " have finished adding Location Lines and Products. When remaining data have been fetched from POQ you can open related Opportunity and select button New/Update Specified Quote.. The button will not be visible before POQ data fetch is done"

formulas.name: TaskDescriptionForCaseOwnerTask
formulas.expression: "Contact " + {!$User.FirstName} + " " + {!$User.LastName} + " on Customer " + {!Opportunity.Account.Name} + " have finished adding data in the portal. Open Activation on related Case and verify data is correct."

formulas.name: TaskSubject
formulas.expression: "Specified Home Office Quote ready to be created/updated"
